content: TE 70-AVR Rotary hammer Very powerful SDS Max (TE-Y) rotary hammer for heavy-duty concrete drilling and chiseling, with Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Rotary hammers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Highest productivity for a wide range of drilling and chiseling applications Low contact pressure for high user comfort Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) makes the tool less tiring to use – helping to increase daily productivity Optional DRS-Y dust removal system collects up to 95% of dust Ruggedly built for a long lifetime Applications Breaching and demolition using pointed and flat chisels Drilling with high torque in wood and steel Hammer drilling in concrete, masonry and natural stone using bits in the 1/2 - 6 diameter range Drilling holes for heavy-duty anchors from 3/4 - 1 3/4 in diameter ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 18.3 lb. Weight class: 15 lb. Single impact energy: 8.5 ft-lbs Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 18.3 lb | Weight class | 15 lb | Single impact energy | 8.5 ft-lbs | Hammer drilling diameter range | 15/32 - 5-29/32 in | Optimum Hammer drilling range | 25/32 - 1-25/32 in | Hammer drilling RPM | 360 rpm | Full hammering frequency | 2760 impacts/minute | Functionality | Active Vibration Reduction (AVR), Chiseling | Triaxial vibration value for hammer drilling into concrete (ah,HD) | 10.8 m/s² | 1 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-Y, TE DRS-D, TE DRS-BK | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 9.0 m/s² | 2 | Rated input power | 1800 W | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 21.3 x 4.9 x 12 mm | A-weighted emission sound power level | 113 dB (A) | 3 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 105 dB (A) | 4 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3514170 - Combihammer performance pkg TE 70 AVR - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 70-AVR 120V Combihammer - 1x TE 70-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-YX 3/4-13 - 1x Pointed chisel TE-YX SM 36 - 2063000 - Corded Rotary Hammer TE 70-AVR 120V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 70-AVR 120V Combihammer - 1x TE 70-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml
